title: Wounded Heart
description: AnnaWhy do you burn for someone who never belongs to you?Why do you hope when you know there is no hope in what you are entering?why do you pray when you know your love will never be loved?This is my story, how Andrew wounded my heart and left me for herAndrewLOVE! A feeling I know I have only for her who is in deep sleep for a long long time.But Lust? Why did I have this feeling of lust when I saw her in the red dress? I knew I need to have her right now and forget all about my pain and misery.She has to get out of my system and I will use her. Is This make me a bastard? Then let it be because I warn her but her innocent blue eyes tell me she wants me as bad as I want her.And I had her and then I left her because my love need me.This is my story, how I wounded Anna's Heart and blacken her soul like I promise I would.
author: Hanna Bans
